description: I have tried to install this with an account already made and it won't work. I logged into my pray account and installed from here and it says it installed but nowhere can I find it on my machine nor does it pop up in my devices category.

Prey is a great project, but this snap apparently does not work on Ubuntu 20.04. It does not add an icon to the application menu and typing "prey" in the command line also does not launch the program.

This copy of prey doesn't work. I found going 
here > https://preyproject.com/download/
and downloading the latest deb package
and opening it with Discover worked for me.
Hope it helps?
summary: This version of Prey is not working on LUbuntu 20.04

description:
As Jon said. Package in Ubunto repos is too old. Download .deb file from https://preyproject.com/download/
And run/Install it. 

After install you can see the service running. `systemctl |grep prey`
"""prey-agent.service               loaded active   running  The Prey daemon."""

Run the prey GUI like this to configure it: `sudo /usr/lib/prey/current/bin/prey config gui`
